Text: Thank you, for all your uploads!!
Ditto!  Thanks for your efforts, and this episode, especially!

Funny how excessive drugs sentences are only a problem for the Right when there's a political point to be scored, and homeland defense is only heavy-handed when it affects members of the Tea Party, eh?! Classic. Great debates from loaded questions do not grow.

The sad thing is all this is like a parody taken deadly seriously, even though it was all predicted years ago by unmatched news satires 'The Day Today' and 'Brass Eye'. For the sake of your own mental health, please at least check out the 'Justice' item from 'The Day Today'...
